flowers.name: With Love
flowers.description: Love adorns a person, opens a second wind and elevates feelings. Present this stunning bouquet of 11 imported roses with love and show your loved one the breadth of your feelings. Let this be the first step in a relationship, an anniversary gift or just a sign of attention, in any case this act will be remembered and rewarded!

flowers.name: Rhodes
flowers.composition: 6 cream roses of Taleya variety, 2 branches of pink and 1 branch of white eustoma

team.name: Alisa Velichko
team.quote: If we could see the miracle of a single flower clearly our whole life would change

team.name: Mary Amiri
team.quote: Minds are like flowers; they open only when the time is right.

team.name: John Doe
team.quote: Flowers don’t worry about how they’re going to bloom. They just open up and turn toward the light and that makes them beautiful.
